## RequestBodyValidationOptions.ajvErrorTransformer property

A function that transform the `ErrorObject`<!-- -->s reported by AJV. This could be used for error messages customization, localization, etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ajvErrorTransformer?: (errors: ajv.ErrorObject[]) => ajv.ErrorObject[];
```
